derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin calcedonius, chalcedonius (often believed to mean 'stone of Chalcedon', but this is doubtful), from Greek khalkēdōn

means.word_mean: 1. a milky or grayish translucent to transparent quartz
